basic.color: Flower color white, light green, leaf color green

maintenance.soil: Peat, perlite, and ceramic in a 2:2:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: In summer put in warm places with scattered light, other seasons place under the sun
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist and leaf surface dry
maintenance.fertilization: Apply phosphorus once after scape elongating, use potassium every half month then
maintenance.pruning: Remove diseased and dead leaves timely
